item.description:
Hi! This is just to let everyone know that I will be playing on the deck at the Sunset Grille in Norlwak on Sunday, September 30th from 4:00 to 7:00 PM. It is ALWAYS great to have some familiar faces in the crowd. If you could stop by - even for a little while - it would be greatly appreciated - especially as this is my first time playing this venue. As this is a public venue, feel free t o bring friends, family or co-workers to enjoy the music, etc.    – the more, the merrier! 

 

ABOUT Tom Ferrara: Tom is a member of Party Express! and will be your event host. Tom performs a classic selection of acoustic folk and mellow rock that includes a varied mix of artists from James Taylor, Jim Croce and The Beatles to Green Day, Dave Matthews and Collective Soul. Tom has performed at a a number of happy hours, open mic nights, private parties, benefits and festivals. For more, check out Tom at: http://www.facebook.com/TheCaptainRocks. 

ABOUT The Sunset Grille: The Sunset Grille is a seasonal seafood restaurant on the water in the Norwalk Cove Marina overlooking scenic Norwalk Harbor in Norwalk Connecticut. Norwalk Harbor sits at the mouth of the Norwalk River and is one of the most beautiful harbors in the State of Connecticut. The restaurant offers a gourmet seafood menu from mid March thru October and a more casual off-season menu with limited hours from November until mid March. The restaurant has been named the “Best Seafood Restaurant” and “Best Outdoor Restaurant in Fairfield County.” You can find ou tmore aboutThe Sunset Grille by visitng their Facebook page at: http://www.facebook.com/?ref=logo#!/pages/Sunset-Grille/110764329008727 by visiting their website at: http://sunsetgrille.net/. , or

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Music on the Deck!
